item.title: Add Email to a Django App
item.description: Email Adding email to an application allows us to provide a better user experience. Users have come to expect certain features such as account confirmation and password reset which are usually accomplished via email. A version of this code can be viewed on GitHub. SendGrid You could acquire email services through dozens of reputable providers but one of the easiest, and free-ist, methods is to use the Sendgrid add-on via Heroku.
